subject: Mathematics
question_text: Given below are two statements: One is labelled as Assertion A and the other is labelled as Reason R: ùëùùêæ ùëé value of phenol is 10 . 0 while that of ethanol is 15 . 9 . Reason R: Ethanol is stronger acid than phenol. explanation of A explanation of A.

options.text: (1) A is true but R is false
(2) A is false but R is true
(3) Both A and R are true and R is the correct
(4) Both A and R are true but R is NOT the correct
